snippet.title: Early Access Trailer - TDS - Tower Defense Strategy
snippet.description:
TDS - Tower Defense Strategy - is coming soon into Early Access on Steam! 
WISHLIST THE GAME!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2392280/TDS/

Check our our 4-player co-op Tower Defense, Real Time Strategy hybrid made by us, Blockage as our first game on a new platform!
Defend your basin, as it must stand at all costs.
Utilize specialized vessels with insanely in-depth towers and methods to defeat your foes
Explore the world and conquer hand-crafted fully unique and interesting maps
And more (:

Tower Defense Strategy
